heroContent.heading: About Me
heroContent.subheading: A developer, maker, and lifelong learner. I’m passionate about building not just websites, but ideas. This page is a bit more personal — here’s my story.

journeyContent.heading: My Journey
paragraph: As a kid, I stumbled upon a beginner programming course and got my first taste of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP. That spark turned into a passion — I dove into countless tutorials, built small projects, and even entered local web development competitions at 14.

Over time, I discovered modern web technologies and gradually shaped the tech stack I use today. Now I’m studying computer science in Poland, focusing on frontend development with Next.js and TypeScript — and fully committed to turning this craft into my life’s work.

valueContent.heading: What I value
paragraph: I believe great software is not just functional — it’s thoughtful.
I care about clean code, accessibility, clear design, and a sense of purpose in every product I build.
Whether it's a full-stack app or a simple landing page, I strive to create things that feel good to use.
To me, craftsmanship matters — and I take pride in the details.

beyondContent.heading: Beyond Code
paragraph: I’m deeply fascinated by Japanese culture and currently learning the Japanese language. In my free time, I love building DIY electronics and creating my own custom devices — it’s where coding meets hands-on creativity.
When inspiration strikes, I also enjoy writing music and capturing moments through amateur photography. These hobbies keep me curious, creative, and always learning.

callToAction.heading: Let’s build something meaningful
callToAction.subheading: Whether you're looking to collaborate, share ideas, or just have a good conversation — I’d love to connect.
